en.title: Professional Experience
en.description: A glimpse into my extensive experience throughout career journey.

en.title: Multi-Disciplined Civilian Analyst
en.description:
• Developed and improved strategies for identifying, organizing, and processing critical information
  • Reviewed and approved official threat advisories and intelligence reports as team Quality Checker
  • Rapidly gained proficiency using a specialized suite of tools to perform research and analysis
  • Enhanced team synergy and productivity by mentoring peers and proposing time-saving strategies
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills facilitated timely responses to customer requirements
  • Participated in professional training courses and conferences, including senior executive shadowing
  • Prepared and presented briefings to large groups of colleagues and customers
  • Participated in hiring assessment validation to improve processes for vetting new personnel

en.title: ProObject Technical Expert
en.description:
• Supported cross-functional team as Subject Matter Expert conducting technical research
  • Gained familiarity with government contract acquisitions and recruitment process
  • Utilized and expanded proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel)
